original_text: When Ebed-melech the Ethiopian, a eunuch who was in the king's house, heard that they had put Jeremiah into the cistern—the king was sitting in the Benjamin Gate—
korean_text: 왕궁 내시 구스인 에벳멜렉이 그들이 예레미야를 구덩이에 던져 넣었음을 들으니라 그 때에 왕이 베냐민 문에 앉았더니

sentences.original_text: a eunuch who was in the king's house,
heard that they had put Jeremiah into the cistern—
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예레미야를 물웅덩이에 던졌다는 것을 듣고,

sentences.original_text: the king was sitting in the Benjamin Gate—
